institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 16 (Conducting education and training using partner training institutions)
contents: Article 16 (Implementation of education and training using partner training institutions) ① The joint training center may provide vocational training using partner training institutions in any of the following cases. However, workers belonging to partner training institutions cannot participate in the training. 1. If the training demand of the contracting company is so high that the joint training center's own facilities cannot meet the training demand of the contracting company, 2. If the training demand of the contracting company is requested by the contracting company. When it is difficult to provide a training course with the joint training center's facilities, equipment, teachers, instructors, etc. 3. In order to operate the training course required by the contracting company, it is provided through another training institution rather than operated directly by the joint training center. In cases where it is recognized that it is advantageous in terms of cost, education and training effectiveness, etc., ② the business group has overall management authority and responsibility for the operation of the partner training institution and may request the partner training institution to submit data or conduct on-site verification, etc. You can. In this case, the partner training institution must actively cooperate., ③ If the business group wishes to change the partner training institution, it must apply for a change in business operation to the chairman at least 20 days before the scheduled change date. In this case, the chairman must review the appropriateness of the change and notify the business group of approval at least 3 days prior to the scheduled change date.
